text: Gongguo bu jiang zhanxian chulai, suoyi ni jiang hui kan dao zui renmen weiju qizhong de jilu. Tamen shuo: Aya! Zhege gongguo bu zenme la, bulun xiao zui dazui, dou hao bu yilou, yiqie dou jiayi jilu. Tamen jiang faxian ziji suo zuo de shi dou yiyi jilu zai benzi shang. Ni de zhu bu kui wang renhe ren.
